data.name: GetApplicationListAll
data.value: SELECT A.ApplicationID, A.Name AS [Application], M.Name AS [Manufacturer], L.Name AS [Language], A.OSType, A.ApplicationType, A.OverridesApplicationID, A.IsOS, A.IsGroup, A.IsBundle, A.IsHidden, A.NoLicenseRequired, A.GloballyGeneratedApplication, AF.Name AS [Family Name], A.EditionIndex, A.VersionIndex, A.CompatibleWithID, A.NoMetering, A.SRSUpdateDate, A.ReleaseDate, A.EndOfSupportDate, A.IsWebApplication, A.DowngradeInstance, A.LicensingForm, A.ApplicationTypes, A.ApplicationBundles, A.DowngradePaths, A.UpgradePaths, A.ProductMajorVersion, A.ProductMinorVersion, A.PreferredMetric, A.MinimumRequirement, A.CoreFactorDefinitionID, A.CreatedDate, A.CreatedBy, A.UpdatedDate, A.UpdatedBy, A.EndOfLifeDate, A.EndOfExtendedSupportDate FROM SnowLicenseManager.dbo.tblApplication A LEFT JOIN SnowLicenseManager.dbo.tblManufacturer M ON A.ManufacturerID = M.ManufacturerID LEFT JOIN SnowLicenseManager.dbo.tblApplicationFamily AF ON A.FamilyIndex = AF.FamilyIndex LEFT JOIN SnowLicenseManager.dbo.tblLanguage L ON A.LanguageID = L.LanguageID ORDER BY A.Name;

data.name: GetApplicationListEmpty
data.value: SELECT TOP 0 A.ApplicationID, A.Name AS [Application], M.Name AS [Manufacturer], L.Name AS [Language], A.OSType, A.ApplicationType, A.OverridesApplicationID, A.IsOS, A.IsGroup, A.IsBundle, A.IsHidden, A.NoLicenseRequired, A.GloballyGeneratedApplication, AF.Name AS [Family Name], A.EditionIndex, A.VersionIndex, A.CompatibleWithID, A.NoMetering, A.SRSUpdateDate, A.ReleaseDate, A.EndOfSupportDate, A.IsWebApplication, A.DowngradeInstance, A.LicensingForm, A.ApplicationTypes, A.ApplicationBundles, A.DowngradePaths, A.UpgradePaths, A.ProductMajorVersion, A.ProductMinorVersion, A.PreferredMetric, A.MinimumRequirement, A.CoreFactorDefinitionID, A.CreatedDate, A.CreatedBy, A.UpdatedDate, A.UpdatedBy, A.EndOfLifeDate, A.EndOfExtendedSupportDate FROM SnowLicenseManager.dbo.tblApplication A INNER JOIN SnowLicenseManager.dbo.tblManufacturer M ON A.ManufacturerID = M.ManufacturerID LEFT JOIN SnowLicenseManager.dbo.tblApplicationFamily AF ON A.FamilyIndex = AF.FamilyIndex LEFT JOIN SnowLicenseManager.dbo.tblLanguage L ON A.LanguageID = L.LanguageID ORDER BY A.Name;

data.name: GetApplicationListTop100
data.value: SELECT TOP 100 A.ApplicationID, A.Name AS [Application], M.Name AS [Manufacturer], L.Name AS [Language], A.OSType, A.ApplicationType, A.OverridesApplicationID, A.IsOS, A.IsGroup, A.IsBundle, A.IsHidden, A.NoLicenseRequired, A.GloballyGeneratedApplication, AF.Name AS [Family Name], A.EditionIndex, A.VersionIndex, A.CompatibleWithID, A.NoMetering, A.SRSUpdateDate, A.ReleaseDate, A.EndOfSupportDate, A.IsWebApplication, A.DowngradeInstance, A.LicensingForm, A.ApplicationTypes, A.ApplicationBundles, A.DowngradePaths, A.UpgradePaths, A.ProductMajorVersion, A.ProductMinorVersion, A.PreferredMetric, A.MinimumRequirement, A.CoreFactorDefinitionID, A.CreatedDate, A.CreatedBy, A.UpdatedDate, A.UpdatedBy, A.EndOfLifeDate, A.EndOfExtendedSupportDate FROM SnowLicenseManager.dbo.tblApplication A INNER JOIN SnowLicenseManager.dbo.tblManufacturer M ON A.ManufacturerID = M.ManufacturerID LEFT JOIN SnowLicenseManager.dbo.tblApplicationFamily AF ON A.FamilyIndex = AF.FamilyIndex LEFT JOIN SnowLicenseManager.dbo.tblLanguage L ON A.LanguageID = L.LanguageID ORDER BY A.Name;

data.name: GetApplicationSearch
data.value: SELECT A.ApplicationID, A.Name AS [Application], M.Name AS [Manufacturer], L.Name AS [Language], A.OSType, A.ApplicationType, A.OverridesApplicationID, A.IsOS, A.IsGroup, A.IsBundle, A.IsHidden, A.NoLicenseRequired, A.GloballyGeneratedApplication, AF.Name AS [Family Name], A.EditionIndex, A.VersionIndex, A.CompatibleWithID, A.NoMetering, A.SRSUpdateDate, A.ReleaseDate, A.EndOfSupportDate, A.IsWebApplication, A.DowngradeInstance, A.LicensingForm, A.ApplicationTypes, A.ApplicationBundles, A.DowngradePaths, A.UpgradePaths, A.ProductMajorVersion, A.ProductMinorVersion, A.PreferredMetric, A.MinimumRequirement, A.CoreFactorDefinitionID, A.CreatedDate, A.CreatedBy, A.UpdatedDate, A.UpdatedBy, A.EndOfLifeDate, A.EndOfExtendedSupportDate FROM SnowLicenseManager.dbo.tblApplication A LEFT JOIN SnowLicenseManager.dbo.tblManufacturer M ON A.ManufacturerID = M.ManufacturerID LEFT JOIN SnowLicenseManager.dbo.tblApplicationFamily AF ON A.FamilyIndex = AF.FamilyIndex LEFT JOIN SnowLicenseManager.dbo.tblLanguage L ON A.LanguageID = L.LanguageID WHERE {ColumnName} {Operator} @SearchTerm ORDER BY A.Name;

data.name: GetUnassignedApplicationListAll
data.value: SELECT U.CID, S.* FROM SnowLicenseManager.dbo.tblSoftwareCIDUnassigned U JOIN SnowLicenseManager.dbo.tblSoftware S ON S.SoftwareCheckSum = U.SoftwareCheckSum;

data.name: GetUnassignedApplicationListComp
data.value: SELECT AC.ComputerName, FS.AppName, FS.AppVersion, FS.AppManufacturer, FS.AppIsOs, FS.SwName, FS.SwManufacturer, FS.SwVersion, FS.SwPathName, FS.SwFileName, FS.SwFileSize, FS.SwInstallDate, FS.SwIsLocal, FS.SwIsMSI, FS.SwLicenseNumber, FS.SwLastScanned FROM SnowInventory.inv.vFilterSoftware FS LEFT JOIN SnowInventory.inv.vAllComputers AC ON AC.ComputerID = FS.ComputerID WHERE {ColumnName} = @SearchTerm

data.name: GetUnassignedApplicationListEmpty
data.value: SELECT TOP 0 U.CID, S.* FROM SnowLicenseManager.dbo.tblSoftwareCIDUnassigned U JOIN SnowLicenseManager.dbo.tblSoftware S ON S.SoftwareCheckSum = U.SoftwareCheckSum;

data.name: GetUnassignedApplicationListSearch
data.value: SELECT U.CID, S.* FROM SnowLicenseManager.dbo.tblSoftwareCIDUnassigned U JOIN SnowLicenseManager.dbo.tblSoftware S ON S.SoftwareCheckSum = U.SoftwareCheckSum WHERE {ColumnName} {Operator} @SearchTerm
